dict.string: I jack, I rob, I sin, im jacki robinson except when i steal base i dodg the pen
Crazy what happens when yu mix athletics and hollywood
One of the best sports movies in recent memory. A great combination of nostalgia and new school swag, cant wait until the sequel
Recognized as one of the most inpirational movies in our generation. Nothing comes close to how friday night lights can capture the hearts and attention of its audience
Jesus Shuttlesworth top recruit in basketball is looking for a way to college but has to overcome a dark family past and the struggles of everyday life
A legendary story of a legendary runner. Prefontaine is the most iconic figure in USA track anf Field History and this movie paints the picture of his ascendance and tragic end
The story of a athlete who persisted until he played football for his dream school the University of Notre Dame
Another great improbable come up story highlighting a the life of a future NFL star and what he went through to get to that point
A bunch of convicts trying to play football in order to get out of jail...More of a comdic movie than a sports movie
